channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
I keep getting these errors everytime i click on an object! Anyone please help!
[code] java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 4 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:11602) at client.process(client.java:11025) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:177) at server.main(server.java:65) Untouched [fatal] - exception Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 4 at client.process(client.java:9552) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:177) at server.main(server.java:65) [/code]

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @podulke podulke
item.description:
@podulke wrote:

I keep getting these errors everytime i click on an object! Anyone please help!

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 4
        at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:11602)
        at client.process(client.java:11025)
        at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:177)
        at server.main(server.java:65)
Untouched [fatal] - exception
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 4
        at client.process(client.java:9552)
